meanings.definition: Either of two large, flat, triangular bones forming the back part of the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: The scapula helps support the shoulder.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her scapula after lifting heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The scapula decided to take a break from holding up the arm.
meanings.sent4: Her scapula was like a sturdy shield protecting her shoulder.
meanings.sent5: The scapula, a key bone in the shoulder, resembles a triangle.
